page.title: 18AROUND HILLDALE FARMS
page.content: In Scissett their used to be a large number of wool mills but in the last few years they have been closing down. Hilldale farms bought a wool factory in 1980 for a dairy and other mills have just been left for sale if any one wants them. Some factories are still at work. They are'nt all wool mills. Some produce engineering products and other small products. Most of Scissett used to be farmland but some shops and houses have been built on the land. There are quite a few left up on the hilly tops. Some farms up there are one hundred years old or more. Most houses and farms are built of stone. The farms in the area are isolated. Most parts of our block are hills,countryside and woodland. Most of the farmland is grassed fields.
